original_text: For if ye throughly amend your ways and your doings; if ye throughly execute judgment between a man and his neighbour;
korean_text: 너희가 만일 길과 행위를 참으로 바르게 하여 이웃들 사이에 정의를 행하며

sentences.original_text: For if ye throughly amend your ways
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 너희가 너희의 길을 완전히 고치면

sentences.original_text: between a man and his neighbour
